title: Thunderbird 128.1.0esr (64-bit)  Constant crashing and "Not Responding"
content: This latest version of Thunderbird is garbage. Constantly crashing and you get the this program is "Not Responding". Been using the program for years and have been very happy with it. Now I'm thinking of dumping it.
creator: klwallis56

title: Trying to get i to emails. Each time a message comes up log into server pop3@slingshot.om or Imax
content: Fix problem for me re emails URGENT jsmethurst@slingshot.co.nz

title: difficulty in setting up Thunderbird on a new PC
content: Why did I have to use Google to be able to access my Thunderbird account? I don't see that as protecting my privacy. Admittedly I haven't previously updated my Thunderbird password as often as I should but I don't see why it couldn't be used to enable Thunderbird on my new computer.
creator: FBDragon
